meanings.definition: The act of composing or creating something.
meanings.sent1: Her compositions of stories always brought smiles to our faces.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to classical compositions by famous composers.
meanings.sent3: His compositions of excuses for being late were always creative.
meanings.sent4: The compositions of his thoughts formed a beautiful tapestry of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The compositions of colors in the painting were truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A piece of music, writing, or art.
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed her latest compositions at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The compositions of flavors in the dish were a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her compositions of emotions on canvas spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The compositions of words in the poem painted a vivid picture.

meanings.definition: The structure or organization of something.
meanings.sent1: The compositions of the essay were clear and logical.
meanings.sent2: The compositions of the building were intricate and impressive.
meanings.sent3: The compositions of ingredients in the recipe were perfectly balanced.
meanings.sent4: The compositions of the team's defense were solid and effective.
meanings.sent5: The compositions of the puzzle pieces fit together seamlessly.
